Petition subject: Slaves

  1. Thomas Smith

Actions taken on dates: 1728-01-06,1728-01-09

Total signatures: 1

Legislative action summary: Received, read, ordered, sent, received, read, concurred, consented

Prayer format was printed vs. manuscript: Manuscript
